404.title: Page not found
404.paragraph1: If you typed the web address, check it is correct.
404.paragraph2: If you pasted the web address, check you copied the entire address.
500.title: Sorry, there is a problem with the service
500.paragraph2: We saved your answers. They will be available when you can access the service again.
cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description1: Cookies are small files saved on your phone, tablet or computer when you visit a website.
cookies.description2: We use cookies to make [service name] work and collect information about how you use our service.
cookies.essential.title: Essential cookies
cookies.essential.description: Essential cookies keep your information secure while you use [service name]. We do not need to ask permission to use them.

yourReference.title: What is your unique reference for this Annex VII record?
yourReference.intro: Your unique reference can be anything that helps you to identify your shipment. For example, it could match a reference on a system you already use to identify shipments. You can use it to find this record in the future.

exportJourney.submitAnExport.title: Create a single Annex VII record
exportJourney.submitAnExport.breadcrumb: Create a single Annex VII record
exportJourney.submitAnExport.intro: You'll be able to check and submit this record once you've completed all the sections.
You'll be able to check and submit this record once you've completed all the sections.
exportJourney.whatsTheWasteCode.title: What's the waste code?
exportJourney.whatsTheWasteCode.naHint: Only select this option if the waste is going to a laboratory.
exportJourney.nationalCode.title: Do you have a national code?
exportJourney.nationalCode.intro: A national code is also known as a commodity code and may be required by the country youâ€™re exporting to.
exportJourney.describeWaste.title: Describe the waste
exportJourney.describeWaste.hint: Give the usual description of the waste. For example, baled PET bottles, bagged HDPE pellets or OCC paper.
exportJourney.exporterDetails.caption: Exporter details
exportJourney.exporterPostcode.title: What's the exporter's address?
exportJourney.exporterPostcode.hint: The exporter is the person who arranges the shipment. This must be a UK address.
exportJourney.exporterDetails.title: Exporter's details
exportJourney.quantity.small.title: Do you know the net weight of the waste?
exportJourney.quantity.bulk.title: Do you know the net weight or volume of the waste?
exportJourney.quantity.intro: This does not include the weight of the container or vehicle. If the weight might change, enter an estimate.
exportJourney.quantity.radioYes: Yes, I know the actual amount
exportJourney.quantity.radioEstimate: No, I will enter an estimate
exportJourney.quantity.radioNo: No, I do not know the amount yet
exportJourney.quantityValue.Actual.title: What is the actual net weight or volume of the waste?
exportJourney.quantityValue.Estimate.tit: What is the estimated net weight or volume of the waste?
exportJourney.quantityValue.intro: Do not include the weight of the container or vehicle.
exportJourney.quantityValue.inputHint: Enter up to two decimal places, for example 5.25
What is the actual net weight of the waste?
exportJourney.quantityValueSmall.Estimat: What is the estimated net weight of the waste?
It needs to be 25kg or under. Do not include the weight of the container or vehicle.
exportJourney.quantityValueSmall.Estimat: It needs to be 25kg or under. You will need to update this with actual details as soon as possible after submitting this export. Do not include the weight of the container or vehicle.
exportJourney.importerDetails.title: Importer details
exportJourney.importerDetails.secondPage: What are the importer's contact details?
exportJourney.wasteCollectionDate.title: Do you know when the waste will be collected?
exportJourney.wasteCollectionDate.intro: The collection date must be at least 3 working days from today.
exportJourney.wasteCollectionDate.radioY: Yes, Iâ€™ll enter the actual date
If the date might change, enter an estimate instead.
exportJourney.wasteCollectionDate.radioN: No, Iâ€™ll enter an estimate date
You must update this with actual details as soon as possible after submitting this record.

exportJourney.wasteCarrierDetails.YouCan: You'll be able to update these details after submitting the record.

How will the first waste carrier transport the waste?
How will the second waste carrier transport the waste?
How will the third waste carrier transport the waste?

exportJourney.wasteCarrierTransport.desc: What are the first waste carrier's {{type}} transportation details?
You can add any details you have about the means of transport, for example any:
exportJourney.wasteCarrierTransport.Road: information about specialist containers being transported
exportJourney.wasteCarrierTransport.AirB: information about specialist containers being transported
exportJourney.wasteCarrierTransport.Rail: information about specialist containers being transported
exportJourney.wasteCarrierTransport.Inla: information about specialist containers being transported
Do you need to add another waste carrier?
You can add up to {{n}} more.
You have added the maximum number of waste carriers.
Are you sure you want to remove this waste carrier?
exportJourney.wasteCollectionDetails.pos: Where will the {{n}} waste carrier collect the waste from?
exportJourney.wasteCollectionDetails.int: This could be from the waste generator, original producer, new producer or collector.
exportJourney.wasteCollectionDetails.con: What are the contact details for the collection address?
exportJourney.wasteCollectionDetails.cou: We'll use this as the exporting country
exportJourney.wasteTransitCountries.titl: Are there any other countries the waste will travel through?
exportJourney.wasteTransitCountries.hint: This will be the first country the waste will travel through. Do not include the exporting or importing country.
exportJourney.wasteTransitCountries.addi: Do you need to add another country?
You must add countries in order of travel
Do not include the exporting or importing country
exportJourney.wasteTransitCountries.chan: What would you like to change {{country}} to?
exportJourney.wasteTransitCountries.conf: Are you sure you want to remove {{country}}?
exportJourney.pointOfExit.caption: Location waste leaves the UK
exportJourney.pointOfExit.title: Do you know the location where the waste will leave the UK?
exportJourney.pointOfExit.intro: For example, the nearest town, port or terminal.
exportJourney.recoveryFacilities.caption: Recovery facility details
exportJourney.recoveryFacilities.country: We'll use this as the importing country. This cannot be the UK.
exportJourney.recoveryFacilities.address: What is the {{n}} recovery facility's address?
exportJourney.recoveryFacilities.name: Facility name
exportJourney.recoveryFacilities.contact: What are the {{n}} recovery facilityâ€™s contact details?
exportJourney.recoveryFacilities.codeTit: What is the recovery code for the {{n}} recovery facility?
exportJourney.recoveryFacilities.maxReac: You have added the maximum number of recovery facilities.
exportJourney.recoveryFacilities.addLege: Do you need to add another recovery facility?
exportJourney.recoveryFacilities.addHint: You can add one more facility.
exportJourney.recoveryFacilities.confirm: Are you sure you want to remove {{name}}?
exportJourney.interimSite.addressTitle: What is the interim siteâ€™s address?
exportJourney.interimSite.name: Interim site name
exportJourney.interimSite.contactTitle: What are the interim siteâ€™s contact details?
exportJourney.interimSite.confirmTitle: Will the waste go to an interim site before it reaches the final recovery facility?
exportJourney.interimSite.confirmHint: This includes for storage or processing.
exportJourney.interimSite.details: An interim site is an authorised facility where the waste gets limited additional processing. For example, at an interim site different plastic waste grades could be separated or stored temporarily before they move to one or more final recovery facilities.
exportJourney.laboratorySite.caption: Laboratory details
exportJourney.laboratorySite.name: Laboratory name
exportJourney.laboratorySite.contactTitl: What are the laboratory contact details?
exportJourney.checkAnswers.caption: Check your record
exportJourney.checkAnswers.heading: Check your answers before submitting this record
exportJourney.checkAnswers.paragraph: Changing an answer could affect other responses youâ€™ve given. Check your responses to make sure theyâ€™re still correct
exportJourney.checkAnswers.warning: You'll need to update any estimated details with actual details as soon as possible after submitting this record.
exportJourney.checkAnswers.changeWasteCo: You are changing your waste code
You are changing your waste code
If you need to change your waste code, this may affect other answers in this record that you may also need to update.
exportJourney.checkAnswers.signDeclarati: By submitting this record, you agree that the information you have provided is accurate. You are confirming that:
all the information you've provided is complete and correct to the best of your knowledge
there is an effective written contractual obligation with the consignee
you've checked with the relevant authorities if there are any local controls that apply in any country involved in the journey of the waste

exportJourney.exportSubmitted.breadcrumb: Create a green list waste movement record
exportJourney.exportSubmitted.panelTitle: Annex VII record update is complete
exportJourney.exportSubmitted.listHeader: Now you have completed the record, you need to:
exportJourney.exportSubmitted.listItemOn: make a note of the transaction number for your records
exportJourney.exportSubmitted.listItemTw: send these details to the relevant UK regulatory authority
exportJourney.exportSubmitted.listItemTh: send a completed Annex VII record with the waste
exportJourney.exportSubmitted.optionalHe: Update this record with actual details
exportJourney.exportSubmitted.secondList: If you've provided estimates, you'll need to provide actual details as soon as possible. This includes the:
exportJourney.exportSubmitted.legalState: It is a legal requirement that a completed Annex VII record travels with the waste. You can use your own or
. Any estimated details you have entered will not appear on the downloaded form. You also need to update any incomplete answers as soon as possible.
